history.proof: qsimpl use: vec_prod_mult. qsimpl use: vec_zero_spec,vec_prod_mult. qsimpl use: exp_zero,vec_zero_spec,vec_prod_mult. hauto l: on depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: specialize (vec_prod_mult n v1 u 0) as H1.
exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat u : pos n v1 : vec nat n The term "n" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "vec nat ?m".
Found no subterm matching "exp ?M2001 vec_zero" in the current goal.
The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.

original: specialize (vec_prod_mult n v1 u 0) as H1. rewrite vec_zero_spec in H1. rewrite exp_zero, Nat.mul_1_r. rewrite <- H1. reflexivity.
